archimate:BusinessFunction.name: PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENT
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Maken, meten en sturen op performance-indicatoren; over te leveren zorg-, research- en onderwijsdiensten, alsmede onderzoek om te komen tot het juiste aanbod van diensten</nl-NL><en-US>Create, measure and direct on performance indicators; about care, research and educational services to be provided, as well as research in order to arrive at the right range of services</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Maken, meten en sturen op performance-indicatoren; over te leveren zorg-, research- en onderwijsdiensten, alsmede onderzoek om te komen tot het juiste aanbod van diensten
Create, measure and direct on performance indicators; about care, research and educational services to be provided, as well as research in order to arrive at the right range of services
